price: 40. And verily, for him is a near access to Us, and a good (final) return (Paradise).
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
